metadata.synopsis: The party interacts with any of the intellect devourers in the Colony, and says this line after the intellect devourers are done speaking. They say this only once.Intellect devourer lines are in: COL_GEN_AD_IntellectDevourer_1cde5899-11a9-e82f-a49d-f038a554490eThey're just generic, neutral lines.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to SCL_Main_A / Colony- Talk to any of the intellect devourers. After they are done speaking, the interacting player will say this line once (non-repeatable).

0.speaker: Player
0.text: They're not attacking. Seems they think we're allies.
